Description: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ON SIZING : Please note that we are a UK company and our items are tagged with UK sizes. Please select the CONVERTED SIZE FOR YOUR COUNTRY from the size menu. Please note that most sizes run small. Hell Bunny Kiss Me Deadly Black Patent Vintage Retro Vampire Fangs Lips Handbag Hell Bunny Kiss Me Deadly Handbag An entirely unique price of arm candy, reserved solely for the most serious alternative fashionistas. The Hell Bunny Kiss Me Deadly Handbag is a sure-fire winner for lovers of 1950s kitsch and vampire chic alike. The style A classic shape combines with a really retro design, making this bag very special indeed. The front of the bag features a statement set of vampire lips in glittering red - this is the kind of handbag that will turn heads, and have everyone asking where you found such a sensational piece of retro-delight. With two top handles and a detachable shoulder strap too - making this beautiful bag incredibly versatile. This stunning vintage style handbag fastens with a kiss-lock fastening, and includes a zip fastening inner pocket, as well as plenty of handy slots to the ivory fabric inner. Approximate measurements: Wide 11 inches x Height 7 inches x Depth 5 inches, with 6 inch handle drop The fabric and finish Crafted from patent black PVC. It's soft to the touch, while offering all the hardwearing qualities you would expect from a Hell Bunny handbag. The metalwear is a striking shade of silver; the perfect compliment to the shiny black and red glitter colour-way. The reason you simply must have this handbag The Kiss Me Deadly handbag is made with a certain lady in mind. By the time you read this, you will already know if that lady is you, because you just won't be able to live without this Hell Bunny bag in your life. YOUR EASY SIZE GUIDE Take a second to check your size with our easy size guides. As a modern fashionista, you're aware of how sizes vary between brands. Simply measure yourself with a snug tape measure while wearing underwear, and then choose your size from the chart. Most of our sizes come up small, and we will despatch your order right after you pay, so it's best to check before you choose. ReturnPolicy.Description:
Is there a purchase return guarantee?

If, for some reason, you are not satisfied with the product you ordered, you can send it back to us. Of course we would undertake the shipping cost in the case that it is the consequence of a mistake on our side. 	

Is it possible to swap the product? 
We will send you another product as soon as we receive the returned package.
We cover the postage cost of the second product in the case that it is due to a mistake on our side. If you change your mind about the product and return it to us, you will be asked to contribute to the product shipping costs. 								

Conditions of the returned product:
Please note that in order to receive a full refund of the product price, or an exchange of equal value, we will ask you to return the product in the same conditions as when we sent it to you.
